name: Unrefined Blink Dagger
description:
**Teleportation**: As an action, you can throw this dagger to an unoccupied space within 60 feet. You instantly teleport to that location. 

Unpredictable Teleportation: After each teleport, there's a 25% chance the dagger breaks, becoming non-magical.
flavor: This dagger crackles with unstable energy.

name: Ring Of Feather Falling
description: When you fall while wearing this ring, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.
